Product Description

2-in-1 Halloween Christmas Projector Lights Moving Patterns Landscape Waterproof Light

Specifications:

Power Output: 14V

Power Consumption: 10.5W

Waterproof Grade: IP65

Power Input: 100-240V, 50/60HZ

Projection Distance: 3-7m / 8.94-22.96ft

Use Scene: Indoor/Outdoor

16 Slides Patterns Mode & 10 Colors Water Wave Mode Create Various Effects for Holiday

16 Holiday Slides Patterns: 5 for Christmas 3 for Halloween 1 for Thanksgiving 1 for Birthday 6 for Celebration

Package Includes:

1 * LED Projector Light

1 * Remote Controller (Without Batteries)

16 * Pattern Slides

1 * Power Adapter

1 * Flat Base

1 * Ground Stake

1 * User Manual

IP65 Waterproof & Easy to Install: The Christmas projector light is designed with an IP65 waterproof rating that is suitable for rain or snow weather. Note: Do not soak it in the water directly. It is easy to install, just find the place you want then plug it into the ground, stable and durable.
Indoor & Outdoor Use: Find the place you want then plug it on the ground, fixed on the wall, ceiling, or put it on a flat surface. To better work (get better brightness and visibility)in the dark environment, place the floodlight 10 -15ft from the projection surface. You also can remotely control the color setting.
Wireless Remote & Auto-Timer: The Halloween Christmas projector light comes with a remote controller and timer . You could use the RF wireless remote control to turn on or off the light, set time 2/4 hours, switch the color of the light, moving speed, and flashing speed to create a fantastical and dynamic effect.
Wonderful Holiday Decoration: This Christmas projector light has 16 slides, the best choice to liven up the atmosphere, suitable for Halloween, Christmas, Thanksgiving day, Valentine’s Day, birthday, holidays, etc. Also Great for a gift for family, relatives, friends or colleagues.

Read more

item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:05 UTC – Details)



【Super Large Projection Area】The upgrade Christmas light projector is designed with two heads, which can cover a larger area than others, its optimal projected area of 215-323ft² with the best projection distance is 16ft-33ft, so it can well cover your house, bedroom, or garden; The clarity of patterns depends on the brightness of the environment
【Waterproof Design & Weather Resistance】The snowflake projector light outdoor features waterproof performance, the light is IP65 waterproof rating and the power adapter is IP44 waterproof rating, which suits for outdoors no matter what weather it is raining or snowing; it can operate normally between -25°C- 32°C, so don’t worry about the hot summer and cold winter; please don’t let it directly soak in a rainstorm
【Easy to set up & Adjustable】 It just takes you a minute or two to install it; our Christmas snowflake projector light comes with a round base and a ground stake, you can put the base on a desk indoors, or you can plug the stake into the ground in your garden, yard, you also can install it on the wall with screws; Equipped with a 360°shaft rotary joint, it is ever so convenient and flexible to adjust the projection place where you want, without dismantling, you can turn it anywhere you want
【Xmas Gift Idea & Xmas Decoration】The Christmas projector outdoor can be given as a special gift to your family, or friends; also it is a great choice to add to the Christmas decoration, suits for Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Valentine’s Day, family gathering, party, theme activity, garden landscape house, bedroom decorations

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:33:32 UTC – Details)

Product Description

INDOOR/OUTDOOR USE – The LED snowflake lights projector is made of ABS and designed with IP44 waterproof, making it durable in a certain degree of rain and snow. For outdoor use, the light show projector can be connected to the ground stake and a 16.4FT long power cord is equipped, while for indoor use, it can be attached to the mounting base.
MULTI-FUNCTION RF REMOTE – The RF remote control for the snowflake projector lights provides a more extensive operational range and easier operation way. You can alter the speed of the snowflake movement and flash at will, as well as set a 2/4/6 hour timer. To save energy, the holiday projector light will automatically switch off after 6 hours of work, but you can restart it.
FOR IMPORTANT MOMENTS – We recommend setting the Christmas projector at a distance of 10 to 25 feet from the projection surface for enhanced brightness and visibility. It can be widely used to celebrate important moments such as Christmas, birthdays, and family reunions and also used as fantastic decoration lighting for bedrooms, living rooms, yard, gardens, and more.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Not only products but also professional after-sales service. If you aren’t happy with the Christmas projector lights outdoor when you receive them, please do not hesitate to contact us for assistance. Our service team will respond within 12 hours to resolve any issue.

From the brand

Christmas Projector Lights

Control the movement speed of the projector light to make the lights dance, create a romantic Christmas atmosphere.

Outdoor & Indoor Use

Red and Green Projector Light

Wall-mounted

【Wide Coverage】With a larger projection area and clearer picture quality, this newest upgraded Christmas light projector can cover up to 3800sf from a distance of 33ft. Anytime, anywhere, create a a cool afffect for you. The power cord of our outdoor star show light is extended to 9.84 ft, which can reach many places. Don’t worry about running out of power outdoors. Perfect for Christmas, birthday parties, festival, party, landscape and wedding decoration
【Remote Control & Timer】50ft barrier free control, easily control the movement speed of the light, change the color of the light. What’s more, this christmas lights outdoor projector has a timer function (0.5h, 3h, 5h and 8h). No need to worry about power consumption, these noiseless rotating light visuals will accompany you into a warm dream
【Easy Installation】Comes with a long ground stake and round base, to insert the projection lamp into the ground or just place on the ground/table/home. Besides, it can also be mounted on th wall. Easy to move to get any areas, it only takes 1 second to create a romantic atmosphere full of stunning illumination!
【Weather Resistance】The outdoor projector light with IP65 waterproof rating, high strength, high toughness. So you do not need to worry about snow, rain, dust and strong sunlight. Rotate the projector head, to fill any place you want with romantic star light (Note: the power plug is IP44 waterproof, do not expose it water or moisture!)

Read more

Christmas Projector Lights Outdoor with Remote Control & Timer, Weather Resistance, Wide Coverage, 6 Patterns

Adjustable projection distance & Super large projection area

  • The best projection distance of this christmas projector light is 16ft-33ft.
  • The upgraded Christmas projector light has a larger projection area and clearer picture quality. Collocated with 360° adjustable projector head, construct a dreamy fairy tale world for you.

Star Shower Christmas Projector Lights Outdoor

With red and green lights blinking on the house, wall, ceiling, and lawn, our Christmas projection lights create a romantic holiday atmosphere

Package Includes

1 x Christmas Projector light

1 x Ground stake

1 x Remote

1 x AC adapter with 3m cable

1 x User instruction

Specification

  • Operating voltages:120V
  • DC adapter:5V 3W
  • Operating temperature: -25℃ to 35℃
  • Material: plastic
  • Waterproof Rank of Light: IP65
  • Waterproof Rank of Plug: IP44
  • Effective removal of the remote control: <15m
  • Scope of application: indoor & outdoor

Read more

Christmas Lights Outdoor Projector

No need for long ladders, complicated installations, troublesome dismantling decorations, or climbing on the house. Say goodbye to traditional hanging string lights. Just turn on our Christmas projector Lights and get a beautiful meteor shower in no time. Great for holiday and commercial ambient decorations, also a fantastic Christmas gift for lover, family, friends, or colleagues.

Flexible Installation

  • Placed on plane; Ground-mounted; Wall-mounted

Read more

Weather Resistance

With IP65 waterproof rating, our christmas lights outdoor projector has high strength, high toughness. Don’t worry about rain, snow, dust, and intense sunlight, enjoy the wonderful and fairy Christmas world.

Wonderful Landscape Spotlight

6 patterns (snowflake, Jingle bell, Christmas tree, Santa Claus, Fireworks and starry sky); 3 working modes (green, red, green and red mixed). Create vivid and beautiful light with the different projector angle.

Outdoor & Indoor Use

Equipped with a round base and ground stake, the star show projector light can be placed anywhere(indoor placement, ground-mounted, wall-mounted). 9.84ft extended power cord solves outdoor wiring issue.

Read more

Remote Control

  • 50ft barrier free control, no point to point operation, easily control the movement speed of the starry projector lamp, change the color of the light.
  • Timer Function: 0.5h, 3h, 5h and 8h on. No need to worry about power consumption, switch the light off at regular intervals.
  • Power cord is 9.84ft. No worry about not being able to touch the power source outdoors.

4.5
Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:15 UTC – Details)

Product Description

PULIVIA 2022 Upgraded Snowflake Projector Light for Christmas

Christmas Snowflake Projector Light

PULIVIA Snowflake Projector light is your perfect choice for Christmas New Year.This Christmas outdoor projector light with three types of snowflake patterns including “Large Snowflake” + “Small Snowflake” + “Snow Dots”. Snowflakes moving in rotation, create a strong sense of space.The outdoor projector light is great for holiday decoration, such as Xmas, New Year weddings, Thanksgiving, birthday parties which makes it a very popular choice.This decoration projector light is a nice gift for you family Christmas.

Christmas Projector Light Outdoor

The projector light comes with 3 Installation Methods and Working Scenarios:

Mounted on the wall for outdoor or indoor;Installed on the grass for outdoor;Place on the table for indoor.

Adjustable Projecting Angle

The Christmas projector light can be adjusted the projection angle, you can adjust it 0 – 180 degree as you need.

Waterproof IP65

PULIVIA snowflake projector lights have a waterproof function: light is IP65 and plug is IP44;The working temperature is -20℃-50℃, apply to outdoor and indoor even if rain or snow;The power adapter is not waterproof.

Package List

1 X LED Light Projector1 X Power Adapter1 X Ground Stake1 X Mounting Plate1 X Fixed Screws1 X Support Frame1 X User Manual

Specification:

Color Black Material ABS, LED Power Consumption 4W (safer than other style) Input Voltage 100-240V AC 50/60HZ Output voltage 14V/0.3A(Low Voltage, very safe) Light Source LED Light Power cord 5m/16.5ft Waterproof Grade light is IP65, Protection Grade: plug is IP44 Operating Temperature -20 °C To 50 °C

Pay Attention:

The best projection distance is 16.5 – 26ft（5-8m）.

【IP65 Waterproof and Easy to Install】— PULIVIA Christmas projector light is made of high-quality ABS material, IP65 waterproof, and the working temperature is -20℃-50℃, apply to outdoor and indoor even if rain or snow. It comes with a round base and a long ground stake, so it can be either staked in the grass or installed indoor. Ultra-long 5m/16.5ft power cable will easily reach most house outlets where you set it up.
【Indoor and Outdoor Projector Light】— PULIVIA Upgraded snowflake projector light is widely used in Halloween, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, Thanksgiving, bars, weddings, family gatherings, etc. Suitable for decorating your garden, house, fence, trees, etc. 7 meter cable can be easily connected and can install indoors or outdoors. The projection distance of the snow lamp is 9.8ft–65.6ft and the best projection range is 16ft—26ft.
【Brighter Clearer and Large Projection Area】— This Christmas projection light is brighter and clearer than other similar snowflake projectors. PULIVIA snowflake projector light is the good choice for your Christmas.
【Safe Projector and Beautiful Decoration】— This snowflake projection light uses high-quality LED lights, with soft and comfortable lighting. Beautiful snowflake decoration, creating a perfect Christmas atmosphere. If you have any questions about this romantic snow light, please contact us via amazon. Our customer service will reply to you within 24 hours.


PULIVIA 2022 Upgraded Snowflake Projector Light for Christmas

  • This Christmas outdoor projector light with three types of snowflake patterns including “Large Snowflake” + “Small Snowflake” + “Snow Dots”. Snowflakes moving in rotation, create a strong sense of space.
  • The outdoor projector light is great for holiday decoration, such as Xmas, New Year weddings, Thanksgiving, birthday parties which makes it a very popular choice.
  • This decoration projector light is a nice gift for you family Christmas.

  • The working temperature is -20℃-50℃, apply to outdoor and indoor even if rain or snow;

Product Description

Christmas Projector Lights Specifications: Input: AC 100V~240V Output: DC 4.5V/1500MA Maximum Coverage: 1500 square feet Effective Remote Distance: 49 feet Product Size:⌀0.33 ft(H) Working Temperature: -13 to 113℉ Power Cable: 16 ft Waterproof Levels: IP65

The house projector lights can show rotating white snowflake patterns, casting a realistic snow scene in your room.

Why do you choose this Christmas snowflake projector light?

Say goodbye to the traditional hanging string lights, illuminating your house within minutes. Just nail it to the ground, plug it in, and aim it at a wall, or any other plane, and it can project white snowflake on the wall or at home. This ensures that there is no extra need to install lighting or be made of any other decorative materials. The wonderful realistic snowflake makes you enjoy the Christmas scene, brings you an unforgettable Christmas experience.

The projector lights come with 16 feet cable, long enough to put it anywhere you want. IP65 waterproof design, and durable material lights body perfect for indoor and outdoor Christmas holiday decorations, parties and themed events, or to create an impressive focal point.

Outdoor Decoration

16-feet long cable makes you have the freedom to position your lights outdoor anywhere. A smart choice to avoid running extension cables across your yard all Christmas.

Indoor Decoration

The snowflakes keep moving automatically like a natural snowfall and will bring you a pleasant and warm Christmas atmosphere, making your family reunion more precious and wonderful.

Flexible Adjustable Angle

Aim your snowfall wherever you like and it can be accurately projected onto the ceiling, floor, or Christmas tree to give your home that sumptuous cozy winter glow.

Wide Projection Range

With a projection area of 1500 sq. ft, your house, courtyard, porch, and garden will be completely covered by romantic and dreamy snowflakes.

Bright and Clear Lighting

High brightness and clear snowstorm images are widely used in discos, clubs, pubs, bars, New year, Valentine’s Day, birthdays, parties, Christmas, weddings, family parties, etc.

Weather Resistant

IP65 waterproof snowflake projectors are made of high-quality materials. Come rain, shine, or heavy ice, you can rest easy knowing that your projector will always be protected.

Diameter/Width
26 Inches 57 Inches 19.2 Inches 36 Inches

Great effect Christmas projector lights outdoor can cover 1500 sq.ft. Brighter, clearer images allow you to fully enjoy a realistic Christmas scene, soft LED lighting provides better eye protection.
IP65 Warterproof Snowfall projector lights comes with 16 feet cable, long enough to put it anywhere you want, and works well even when it rains or snows. It’s definitely the best Christmas holiday decoration for any house.
Easy installation Snowflake projector lights for indoor and outdoor use, the stand base can be placed directly on any flat surface, or fixed on the wall with screws. Long ground stake for easy positioning in your garden.
24 HOURS ONLINE – Your satisfaction is our main priority. You can contact our 24 hours available customer service through clicking “”Sold by”” on the product detail page or your Amazon order page and you will be directed to “”Ask a question”” to send us a message.

Christmas Projector Lights Specifications:
  • Input: AC 100V~240V
  • Output: DC 4.5V/1500MA
  • Maximum Coverage: 1500 square feet
  • Effective Remote Distance: 49 feet
  • Product Size:⌀0.33 ft(H)

  • Power Cable: 16 ft
  • Waterproof Levels: IP65

Product Description

Meteor Shower Laser Light Projector

Indoor Use

Outdoor Stake Mounted

Wall Mounted

Specification

Applicable Voltage: 120v 60hz

Power Adapter: 3.6V 5.4W

Power Cord Length: 16.4ft

Laser Wavelength: Red Laser 650nm; Green Laser 532nm

Laser Classification: Class ǁ

Operating Temperature: -4℉ to 105℉

Material: Aluminum Alloy & ABS Plastic

Waterproof Level: IP65

Package Contents 1* Laser Light 1* Ground Stake 1* Remote Control 1* AC Adapter 1* Instruction Manual 1* 16.4ft Power Cord

Installation Tutorial:

Insert the pole part through the circular ring part into the hole. Then rotate counterclockwise to

tighten it.

Landscape Light: Attach the light top to the light stake, rotate counterclockwise to tighten the nut. If the ground is hard or dry, water the soil along the area there the lights will be installed.

Allow the soil to soak for few hours. Then drive the stake into the ground. Don’t force the lights

into the ground as this might damage the stakes.

Connect with Light Base: Attach the light top to the light base, rotate clockwise to tighten it.

Adjust Angle: You can rotate the light head to desired angle.

Power Supply: Plug cord to power adapter connector, counterclockwise tighten the anti-water

dust cover.

【Plug and Play】Extremely easy to install, everybody can do it! 16ft long extension cord is so convenient for providing power from a distance!
【Weather Resistance】No worry about raining, snowing and frosting. IP65 shell and IP44 plug provides you waterproof and dustproof. Working temperature is -4℉ to 105℉.
【Indoor and Outdoor】It can be used for garden and house decoration, creating festival atmosphere for Halloween, Christmas, New Years, Birthday party, etc.
【Remote Control】You can control the light at a distance of about 30ft through a remote control. You can not only speed up to make the laser move faster, also speed down to make the laser to be static. Set the timer for 2H/4H/6H/8H to make the light on at dusk and off at dawn.

Meteor Shower Laser Light Projector

Outdoor Stake Mounted

Wall Mounted

Product Description

Do you want to organize a dazzling party for the coming Christmas?

Our Christmas Projector Lights can help you realize this idea, creating the perfect party atmosphere and giving you a wonderful party with a unique style!

Just place it on the lawn and plug it in, you can cast dynamic patterns on the wall. 16 interchangeable slides, dynamic or static, not only for Christmas but also for Halloween, Easter, weddings, New Year, or birthdays! Decorated with it, your house will attract everyone’s attention at every carnival! Choose it, choose your amazing pleasure!

Place the projector lights 10 to 15ft from the projection surface for better results brightness and visibility.

Ultra-long 3m / 10ft power wire will easily reach most house outlets where you set it. (The darker the surroundings, the better the projection effect).

Package Content:

1x projection lamp

1x ground spike

1x 16 slides

1x user manual

【Easy Installation and Operation】Installation of the projector lamp is very convenient. You only have to loosen the two screws on the lamp body to easily switch the image card. Besides, the stable base is suitable for placing in a position on a level surface. And you can also use the attached ground spike, which is practical for you to install the lamp on the ground or on the lawn.
【IP44 Waterproof & Extreme Weather Resistance 】The IP44 waterproof Christmas projector lamp can withstand heavy rain, cold snow, and hot weather. The thick plastic shell further strengthens the rain cover and protects the lamps.
【Adjustable angle and Images Size】With the 3m long cable, the LED Christmas projector lamp extends the area and image size that can be illuminated. The 180 ° vertical adjustable angle can freely adjust the angle, giving you more options to display beautiful bright patterns.
【The Perfect Winter Gift for Your Family】 The LED Projection Lamp uses high-quality cards to deliver a bright and clear Image effect. A winter surprise for the family, spend the happy holidays with relatives together!

2023 Upgraded Dynamic Christmas Snowflake Lights
The bright snowflake projection lamp can project dynamically rotating snowflakes and snow spots, so that you can feel the white romance even indoors or outdoors, making the festival atmosphere more intense.
Multiple Installation Methods：

  • It can install it on the wall with screws.
  • It can also put it on the floor or on the table.
  • It can also be inserted into the lawn using ground plugs.

Package Includes：
1*Christmas Lights Projector
1*Power cord plug
1*Ground Stake
1*Lamp Post
1*Lamp Holder
2*Screws
CAUTIONS:

  • IP65 is waterproof and can work in rainy and snowy days. (Please keep the plug dry)
  • Note that this Christmas snowflake projector cannot project the whole house.
  • The closer the position of the snowflake, the smaller the projection and the higher the clarity.
  • The farther away the snowflake is, the larger the projection and the lower the clarity.



【3 Installation Methods】The Christmas projector lights has a round base and a support frame that can be inserted into an outdoor floor, placed on an indoor table, or mounted on a wall. The snowflake projector has a 170° adjustable light head for a larger projection angle. 10ft of cable is convenient to connect to the power supply.
【Christmas Projector Lights Outdoor】The Christmas snowflake projection light is equipped with an IP44 power adapter, so it works even in rain and snow. Operating temperature range is -44°F to 80°F. NOTE: Please do not immerse the plug directly in heavy rain.
【Wide Application】LED snowflake projector lights is widely used for Christmas, Valentine’s Day, Thanksgiving, bars, weddings, family gatherings, party decorations, etc. This snowflake projection light is perfect for indoor and outdoor use, making the daily/festival atmosphere more intense.
【Perfect Christmas Gift】This snowflake projector light is perfect for creating a romantic atmosphere for Christmas and other holidays, and is also a perfect gift for friends and family. If there is a problem with the Christmas snowflake projector you purchased, please contact us for a replacement.

4.5
